titles: A combat betwixt man and death: or A discourse against the immoderate apprehension and feare of death. Written in French by I. Guillemard of Champdenier in Poictou. And translated into English by Edw. Grimeston Sargeant at Armes, attending the Commons House in Parliament
Duel de l'homme et de la mort. English
author: Guillemard, Jean.
Grimeston, Edward.
notes: A translation of: Le duel de l'homme et de la mort.
With a final errata leaf followed by a blank leaf.
Running title reads: The combate betwixt man and death.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Death --  Religious aspects --  Christianity --  Early works to 1800.
